article_title: Rep. Ami Bera has earned a second term
article_text: Democratic Rep. Ami Bera has earned The Sacramento Bee’s endorsement in a tough race against Republican Doug Ose for a Sacramento-area congressional seat. The 7th Congressional District race is a national battleground.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Ami Bera, Doug Ose, Sacramento-area congressional seat, Congressional District 7, national battleground, Tim Murphy

article_summary:
Democratic Rep. Ami Bera has earned The Sacramento Bee’s endorsement in a tough race against Republican Doug Ose for a Sacramento-area congressional seat.
The 7th Congressional District race is a national battleground.
